tags.name: cases
tags.description: Case APIs enable you to open and track issues.

get.description: Returns the cases associated with a specific alert. You must have `read` privileges for the **Cases** feature in the **Management**, **Observability**, or **Security** section of the Kibana feature privileges, depending on the owner of the cases you're seeking.

parameters.name: owner
parameters.description: A filter to limit the response to a specific set of applications. If this parameter is omitted, the response contains information about all the cases that the user has access to read.

parameters.name: spaceId
parameters.description: An identifier for the space. If you omit `/s/` and this identifier from the path, the default space is used.
